snippet: Trading was thin as the stock markets drifted lower, after starting the year with a vigor that last week drove the Standard & Poor’s 500 to a five-year high.
abstract: Trading is thin as stock markets drifts lower, after starting year with vigor that drove Standard & Poor’s 500 to five-year high.
lead_paragraph: Trading was thin as the stock markets drifted lower, after starting the year with a vigor that last week drove the Standard & Poor’s 500 to a five-year high.

headline.seo: U.S. Markets Edge Back From Recent Rally
headline.main: Wall Street Edges Back From Its Six-Week Rally
headline.print_headline: Wall Street Edges Back From Its Six-Week Rally
